## Usage Guidelines

### Do

- Use logos at appropriate sizes (minimum 100px width)
- Maintain aspect ratio when scaling
- Use appropriate color version for background
- Include adequate clear space around logos

### Don't

- Stretch or distort logos
- Change logo colors
- Place logo on busy backgrounds
- Add effects (shadows, glows, etc.)
- Crop or modify the logo design

## Download All Assets

All branding assets are available in the lab-handbook repository:

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/rashidlab/lab-handbook.git

# Assets location
ls lab-handbook/assets/branding/
# logos/
# hex-stickers/
# presentation-template.css
```

## Requesting New Assets

Need a logo in a different format or a new hex sticker? Contact Naim or open an issue in the [lab-handbook repository](https://github.com/rashidlab/lab-handbook/issues).
